name: Eduardo Galeano
description: Uruguayan journalist, writer, and novelist, best known for his critique of European and US imperialism in Latin America
philosophy: We are what we do, especially what we do to change what we are. History never really says goodbye.
contributions: The Open Veins of Latin America
quotes: The language of the market is the only universal language
History is a prophet with its face turned backward
We are all mortal until the first kiss and the second glass of wine
